description: 工具目录说明文件，包含所有工具的分类和详细信息
description_en: Tools directory description file, containing all tool categories and detailed information

categories.name: CPU_Tools
categories.description: CPU 相关的检测、监控和优化工具
categories.description_en: CPU-related detection, monitoring, and optimization tools

tools.name: CoreTemp
tools.description: Core Temp 是一款轻量级的 CPU 温度监控工具，可以实时显示每个 CPU 核心的温度。
tools.description_en: Core Temp is a lightweight CPU temperature monitoring tool that displays real-time temperature for each CPU core.
tools.author: Arthur Liberman

tools.name: CPUZ
tools.description: CPU-Z 是一款免费的硬件信息检测工具，可以显示 CPU、主板、内存等硬件详细信息。
tools.description_en: CPU-Z is a free hardware information detection tool that displays detailed information about CPU, motherboard, memory, and other hardware.
tools.author: CPUID

tools.name: ThrottleStop
tools.description: ThrottleStop 是一款强大的 CPU 性能调节工具，可以解除 CPU 降频限制，提升性能。
tools.description_en: ThrottleStop is a powerful CPU performance tuning tool that can remove CPU throttling limitations and improve performance.
tools.author: Kevin Glynn

categories.name: Display_Tools
categories.description: 显示器测试和校准工具

tools.name: Color_Gamut_Test
tools.description: 色域测试工具，用于检测显示器的色彩覆盖范围。
tools.description_en: Color gamut test tool for detecting the color coverage range of displays.

tools.name: Online_Screen_Test
tools.description: 在线屏幕测试工具，用于检测显示器坏点、色彩等问题。
tools.description_en: Online screen test tool for detecting dead pixels, color issues, and other display problems.

tools.name: UFO_Test
tools.description: UFO 测试工具，用于检测显示器的响应时间和拖影问题。
tools.description_en: UFO test tool for detecting display response time and motion blur issues.
